title: Blue Boy Vegetarian Food Centre
description: 蓝兒素食店 Kedai Kopi & Makanan Blue Boy Vegetarian. This centre houses some stalls selling vegetarian with Asian dishes such as char kway teow, assam laksa, curry mee, dry/soup noodles, popiah, laksa, cheecheong fun, tom yam, fried rice, yongtaufoo, curry puffs, etc. Also a dry goods shop. Feb 2016 reported the centre is still operating.
streetAddress: 6001, Blue Boy Mansion, Jalan Tong Shin
